summary: This mod adds into the game; Two New Spells, Two New Races, Two New Factions, Two New Classes.
descriptionHtml:
[color=gold][b][u][i][size=10]Demons & Angels[/size][/i][/u][/b][/color]



[size=5]This mod adds into the game; Two New Spells, Two New Races, Two New Factions, Two New Classes.[/size]




[youtube]GFUBJfcV-HU[/youtube]


[size=4][u]Spells[/u][/size]
[size=2]Demon Spell - Demons Flames[/size]
[size=2]Angel Spell - Angels Healing[/size]


[size=4][u]Races[/u][/size]
[size=2]Demon Race - Demon[/size]
[size=2]Angel Race - Angel[/size]


[size=4][u]Factions[/u][/size]
[size=2]Demon Faction[/size]
[size=2]Angel Faction[/size]


[size=4][u]Classes[/u][/size]
[size=2]Demon Class - Demon[/size]
[size=2]Angel Class - Angel[/size]


[size=4][u]Demon Race Details[/u][/size]
[size=2] It is said that when a master of Destruction magic consumes the blood of Nirn they will become a Demon[/size]
[size=2][u]Demon Race Stats[/u][/size]
[size=2]Health = 250[/size]
[size=2]Magicka = 250[/size]
[size=2]Stamina = 250[/size]
[size=2]Base Carry Weight = 1000[/size]
[size=2]Health Regen = 4.9000[/size]
[size=2]Magicka Regen = 15.0000[/size]
[size=2]Stamina Regen = 25.0000[/size]
[size=2]+100 Destruction[/size]
[size=2]+10 Heavy Armor[/size]
[size=2]+10 Two Handed[/size]
[size=2]Resist Disease[/size]
[size=2]Resist Poison[/size]


[size=4][u]Angel Race Details[/u][/size]
[size=2] It is said that when a master of Restoration magic consumes the blood of Nirn they will become a Angel[/size]
[size=2][u]Angel Race Stats[/u][/size]
[size=2]Health = 250[/size]
[size=2]Magicka = 250[/size]
[size=2]Stamina = 250[/size]
[size=2]Base Carry Weight = 1000[/size]
[size=2]Health Regen = 4.9000[/size]
[size=2]Magicka Regen = 15.0000[/size]
[size=2]Stamina Regen = 25.0000[/size]
[size=2]+100 Restoration[/size]
[size=2]+10 Light Armor[/size]
[size=2]+10 One Handed[/size]
[size=2]Resist Disease[/size]
[size=2]Resist Poison[/size]


[size=4][u]Version 2[/u][/size]
[size=2]Version 2 adds, new versions of the Angels and Demons, with the Demons having Horns and Black Wings, and the Angels having White Wings and a Halo.[/size]


[size=4][u]Credits[/u][/size]
[size=2]Enoomnai - for making the mod
Volvaga0 - for design the horns and the halo
badgremlin - for designing the wings[/size]












I Hope You Enjoy The Mod
author: Enoomnai
